reuters.title: GE <GE> VENTURE WINS JET ENGINE ORDER
reuters.body: CFM International, a joint venture of <SNECMA> of France and General Electric Co said it received an order for its CFM56-5 engines worth 320 mln dlrs from <GPA Airbus 320 Group Ltd, Shannon, Ireland. The company said the engines will power 25 twin-engine Airbus Industrie A320 aircraft. Reuter 
